channel.title: RuneFuse 317 [Looking For Staff]
channel.description:
Hello folks! My name is Anthony, I am a staff member with a brand new and amazing server we call 'RuneFuse'! Our objective when starting this new server is an attempt at express our own desires in gaming and allow others to do the same. We may be new but we are here to stay for the long run and hope to see more unique players to come and join our diverse community. We welcome you to this new and modest server!
Jump into the fun NOW at: [url=http://runefuse.com]runefuse.com[/url] Hosted. 24/7. 100% up time. Fully operation PVP & PVM.
Please enjoy this miniscule tour:
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/awc32g.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/smf49e.jpg[/img]
We have a wide variety of mini-games that are fully functioning and are there for you and your friends!
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2ustouc.jpg[/img]
What really makes us unique is that we have a specific store related to points you accumulate throughout your activities in the server. Killing and skilling all provide tender that can be used to redeem these goods. We also feature the elemental whip which holds untold powers..(the purple one). We also offer a large asortement of other costum goods through the server.
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2n22wsw.jpg[/img]
Hey you! Yeah you!! Stop sitting around there and come on by! Our webclient is fully operationable and our staff are friendly. Who know's you may just be the next one ;)
:D
-Anthony RuneFuse Staff

item.title: RuneFuse 317 [Looking For Staff]
item.dc:creator: @kushh_daddy kushh daddy
item.description:
@kushh_daddy wrote:

This server is SO LEGIT. I can already tell that this server is going to go far! I haven’t played long, but in the short time that I have played, it’s by far the best rsps i’ve ever played.

Read full topic

Hello folks!
My name is Anthony, I am a staff member with a brand new and amazing server we call ‘RuneFuse’! Our objective when starting this new server is an attempt at express our own desires in gaming and allow others to do the same. We may be new but we are here to stay for the long run and hope to see more unique players to come and join our diverse community. We welcome you to this new and modest server!

We have a wide variety of mini-games that are fully functioning and are there for you and your friends!
